generatedPrompts.backCover: A simple, minimalist design with a clean, full-bleed soft sky-blue background. A single, stylized graphic of a tiny patriotic top hat sits askew in the top-center, as if it has gently floated down. The bottom-right corner is intentionally left clear and undecorated. The overall feeling is serene and resolved.
generatedPrompts.frontCover: A flat 2D illustration in a Smart Style of a cool, anthropomorphic hot dog wearing sunglasses, a patriotic top hat, and blue denim shorts. The hot dog is mid-air, having been launched from a birthday cake that has a single, lit firework candle erupting from the center. The background is a vibrant, full-bleed pattern of red, white, and blue geometric shapes on a soft sky-blue backdrop. Centered text below the action reads "Happy Birthday!" in an elegant, flowing, dark blue handwritten cursive script. The main character is positioned centrally, away from edges.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: An artistic, abstract representation of a firework explosion in the Smart Style. The image is a dynamic burst of concentric circles and radiating lines using the card's red, white, and dark blue color palette against the soft sky-blue background. The shapes are clean, geometric, and stylized, capturing the joyful energy of a firework in a modern, non-literal way. The design is celebratory and visually connects to the firework candle on the front cover, while remaining an elegant, abstract piece of art.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: A clean, soft sky-blue background matching the rest of the card. The message is centered, written in a beautiful, flowing, dark blue handwritten cursive script. The text reads: "Wishing you a birthday that's even more spectacular than a firework finale! May your day be full of fun and celebration, and may all your hot dogs stay safely on your plate. Happy Birthday!". The text is elegantly framed by a cascade of small, minimalist star illustrations in red and white, gently falling down from the top corners towards the center, as if they are sparks from the firework finale.
